title: Gastroenteritis
summary: Gastroenteritis, also known as infectious diarrhea and gastro, is inflammation of the gastrointestinal tract; the stomach and intestine.[8] Symptoms may include diarrhea, vomiting and abdominal pain.[1] Fever, lack of energy and dehydration may also occur.[2][3] This typically lasts less than two weeks.[8] It is not related to influenza, even though in the US it is sometimes called the "stomach flu".[9]
